subsection.name: Project View Tab: Main View
subsection.p: The project view contains useful information and metrics about your project, such as where files are stored, Test Metrics and MockService Metrics. This is intended as a very quick way of getting information and overview of the project.
We also have a number of project related inspectors at the bottom of the screen

subsection.name: Description Inspector
subsection.p: The Description Inspector is a way to write and maintain general information about the Project.

subsection.name: Description Inspector
subsection.p: The Properties Inspector handles Project level Properties. These properties can be used in levels below the Project.

subsection.name: Load Script Inspector
subsection.p: The Load Script Inspector enable you to create Groovy Scripts that runs whenever you open a project. This might be setting Project Properties, synching Project Requirements with external sources and more.

subsection.name: Save Script Inspector
subsection.p: The Save Script Inspector is the opposite of the Load Script Inspector, it enables you to create Groovy Scripts that runs whenever you close a project. This might be writing data to file, synching Project Requirements with external sources and more.
